pullrequest.title: Only initialize the marker service in the client (GUI) scene [targeting gazebo8]

content.raw:
So I'm fine with merging this into Gazebo8 so it works consistently for the client scene. It could be worth it adding a note to the example [README](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/8a59b5f0f0b9bda21ee905098b47900da492ba9c/examples/stand_alone/marker/?at=default) mentioning markers won't be visible for camera sensors.

And then we ticket an issue about splitting the service into 2, or turning it into a simple pub/sub so that multiple subscribers can subscribe to the same topic.
